displayName: Call of Garrison Duty - CAL compatible
description:
Community Arc Loader compatible release. Compatible with Misfit Pilot Quests and any other mod that is supported by Community Arc Loader.

Accept long-term garrison duty contracts and skip the timeline forward a number of years at a time.

Upkeep costs will be subsidized, but don't expect to make much profit.

Perfect for those who want to skip their timeline forwards a number of years without going broke.

Notes:

If you leave the planet you are garrisoning before accepting the 'Begin Garrison Duty' quest the questline will be cancelled

Currently there are 5 garrison quests available in steiner territory. Completing & extending all 5 contracts will advance you 30 years.

Every garrison quest has a shortcut method to activate it. Visiting a specific planet.

Halfway = Duran
Horneburg = Vorzel
Fatima = Garrison
Florida = New India
Rajkot = Yeyvareb

Required mods:
Community Arc Loader
author: Snafulator
